data.title: Blue Card Services
meta_keywords: Blue Card Services; BCS; Working with Children Check; blue card; Working with Children (Risk Management and Screening) Act 2000; Working with Children (Risk Management and Screening) Regulation 2020
data.meta_description: Blue Card Services contributes to the creation of safe service environments for children and administers Queensland’s Working with Children Check to regulate activities that are essential to children’s lives.
data.text:
Translation and interpreting support

If English is not your first language and you need support to understand information about Blue Card Services on this website, please call Language Loop on 1800 512 451 and ask for an interpreter.

You can also access information about translation services in your language.

Online applicant portal

You can log in to the Blue Card Services online applicant portal to update personal details and make other changes to your blue card.

You will need to register for an online account before you can use the portal.

Contact us

Call us on 1800 113 611 or (07) 3211 6999 or send us an email.

Callers who are deaf or have a hearing or speech impairment can contact us through the National Relay Service.
